testcase.classname: Login functionality for Adactin web application
testcase.name: User verify for valid login credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch the browser........................................passed And User hold for '3' seconds...............................................passed Then User should verify the Welcome to AdactIn Group of Hotels is displayed in the login page.passed When User enters the username in the login page.............................passed And User enters the password in the login page..............................passed And User clicks the Login button in the login page..........................passed And User hold for '3' seconds...............................................passed And User clicks the Logout button in home page..............................passed
